measured_by: Structured Clinical Interview for DSM-IV Axis II Diagnoses (SCID-II)
justification: The diagnosis of each BPD patient was confirmed through the Structured Clinical Interview for DSM-IV Axis II Diagnoses, indicating it was used to assess BPD.
Participants completed a Borderline Personality Feature (PAI-BOR) self-report questionnaire, which was used to measure borderline personality features.
The Barratt Impulsivity (BIS) questionnaire was used to assess impulsivity in participants.

topic_or_construct: decision-making behavior involving prior and likelihood information
justification: The coin-catching sensorimotor task was employed to assess how BPD patients use and rely on prior and likelihood information in decision-making.
